title: UK Russia both separate head of state and govt.

content.question: Which of the following is a feature shared by the political systems of Great Britain and Russia?

choices.label: Bicameral legislatures with two equal houses
Separate individuals serving as head of state and head of government

content.answer: Separate individuals serving as head of state and head of government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
